old: she walked out of a museum and the alarm went off.
she was a waitress at The Last Supper.
when she was in school, there was no history class.
she knew Burger King while he was still a prince.
her birth certificate is in Roman numerals.
her birth certificate says expired on it.
her social security number is one.
scary: you thought the monsters in your closet were friends.
the government moved Halloween to her birthday.
she threw a boomerang, and it refused to come back.
she made One Direction go the other direction.
the robber ran away once he saw her.
when she went to the zoo, the lions and tigers hid from her.
she has to trick-or-treat by phone.
american: she sued McDonald's for selling French fries.

depressing: blues singers come to visit her when they've got writer's block.

unfunny: she ruins every joke she ever tells.

protective: she covered you in Band-Aids before you got the boo-boos.
